name: Steam
description: Digital distribution service for PC games with over 50,000 titles

name: Epic Games Store
description: Digital storefront for PC games known for free weekly games

name: PlayStation Network
description: Online gaming service for PlayStation consoles with digital store

name: Xbox Game Pass
description: Subscription service offering access to hundreds of games

name: Nintendo eShop
description: Digital distribution service for Nintendo consoles

name: GOG.com
description: Digital distribution platform focused on DRM-free games

name: Origin
description: Digital distribution platform for EA games

name: Ubisoft Connect
description: Digital distribution platform for Ubisoft games, formerly Uplay

name: Battle.net
description: Online gaming platform for Blizzard Entertainment games

name: Xbox Live
description: Online multiplayer gaming and digital media delivery service for Xbox
